channel.title: Providers on Ernest
channel.description: Recent content in Providers on Ernest

item.title: Providers
item.description: Amazon Web Services Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a secure cloud services platform, offering compute power, database storage, content delivery and other functionality to help businesses scale and grow. The following AWS services are supported by Ernest: EC2 VPC ELB S3 Route53 RDS EBS IAM Example YAML --- name: demo project: my-dc vpcs: - name: my-vpc id: vpc-abcdef01 subnet: 10.0.0.0/16 auto_remove: true networks: - name: web subnet: 10.
